mapper.update: update schedule_job_operator_record set operator_expired = #{operatorExpired}, version = version + 1, gmt_modified = now() where id = #{id} and version = #{version}
mapper.delete: delete from schedule_job_operator_record where job_id = #{jobId} and operator_type = #{type}
mapper.select: select gmt_create from schedule_job_operator_record where id=#{id} and is_deleted=0;
